testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for UPCOMING_BILLS Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight that lists upcoming recurring bills within a configured time period.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for UPCOMING_SUBSCRIPTION Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight that lists upcoming recurring subscription within a configured time period..

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for BILL_PAID Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when a recurring bill is paid.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for SUBSCRIPTION_PAID Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when a recurring subscription is paid.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for SUBSCRIPTION_NOT_PAID Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight if a recurring subscription has not been paid for more than a configured number of days.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for BILL_NOT_PAID Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight if a recurring bill has not been paid for more than a configured number of days.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for SALARY_CHANGED Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when a recurring salary changes by more than a configured threshold.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for NEW_SALARY Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when a new recurring salary is detected.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for COUNT_OF_TRANSACTIONS_BY_MERCHANT Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight that provides spending trends (based on transaction count) by merchant over a configured time period.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for CHANGE_IN_ASSETS Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when total assets change by more than a configured threshold.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for CHANGE_IN_NETWORTH Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when net worth changes by more than a configured threshold.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for CHANGE_IN_PROPERTYVALUE Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when the value of property changes by more than a configured threshold.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for CHANGE_IN_LIABILITIES Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when total liabilities change by more than a configured threshold.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for LOAN_MATURITY_NOTICE Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when a loan is within a configured number of days from maturity.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for INVESTMENT_MATURITY_NOTICE Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when an investment is within a configured number of days from maturity.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for CARD_STATEMENT_AVAILABLE Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when a new credit card statement is available.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for SPENDING_BY_MERCHANT Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight that provides spending trends (based on $ amount) by merchant over a configured time period.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for AGGREGATE_INSURANCE_ACCOUNT Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when an insurance payment is identified but no corresponding insurance account was found for the user.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for AGGREGATE_CREDIT_CARD_ACCOUNT Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight to alert user to aggregate his credit card account if a credit card payment is found for the user in any of his bank accounts.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for CARD_PAYMENT_DUE_REMINDER Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when a credit card payment is due in the coming days based on a configured threshold.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for AGGREGATE_MORTGAGE_ACCOUNT Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when a mortgage payment is identified but no corresponding mortgage account was found for the user.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for CREDIT_UTILIZATION_SINGLE_CARD Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when the balance on a single credit card is more than a configured threshold.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for SPENDING_BY_CATEGORY Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight that provides spending trends (based on $ amount) by category over a configured time period.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for FINANCIAL_FEES Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight that provides financial fee trends over a configured time period.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for AGGREGATE_REAL_ESTATE_ACCOUNT Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when a mortgage payment is identified but no corresponding real estate account was found for the user.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for INCOME_THRESHOLD Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when income for the current month is more than a configured threshold.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for AGGREGATE_SAVINGS_CHECKING_ACCOUNT Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when a credit card account is identified but no corresponding bank account was found for the user.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for AGGREGATE_INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when an investment transaction is identified but no corresponding investment account was found for the user

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for BALANCE_ABOVE_THRESHOLD Insight
insightTitle: Generates an insight when the balance of a bank account is above a configured threshold.
insightDescription: Generates an insight when the balance of a bank account is above a configured threshold.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for CREDIT_UTILIZATION_ALL_CARDS Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when the balance on all credit cards is more than a configured threshold.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for NEW_SUBSCRIPTION Insight
insightTitle: Generates an insight when a new recurring subscription is detected.
insightDescription: Generates an insight when a new recurring subscription is detected.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for NEW_BILL Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight when a new recurring bill is detected.
